Description.Text: This city hotel is situated in the city of Dakar. The establishment enjoys a pleasant location at Ngor's bay, and is also just 5 km from the centre of town. Dakar Airport is approximately 5 km from the accommodation.

These guest rooms are fitted with individually regulated air conditioning, and feature a shower, bath, double bed, direct dial telephone and satellite/cable TV. WLAN Internet access and an individual safe also come as standard.

This city hotel is a privileged setting for travellers arriving in Dakar aiming to discover Senegal, but it is also a haven of peace for business travellers looking for the comfort and the service of a quality hotel. Fully air-conditioned, the establishment was renovated in 2008 and comprises a total of 31 rooms, including apartments and studios. Guests are welcomed into a lobby, and on-site facilities include a 24-hour reception service, currency exchange facilities, a bar, a restaurant, and a laundry service for which fees apply. Guests arriving by car can leave their vehicles in the nearby car park.
